movies.title: Zero Woman
movies.plot: A gang of young thieves try to rob a mob boss, but their heist is interrupted by an officer of the Tokyo Police Department's elite Zero Division. They get away with the loot, but the officer, a beautiful, more-than-slightly psychotic young woman who also happens to be an excellent shot, is tracking them down. To bring the case to a successful conclusion, she must deal with rival crime gangs, small- time crooks, and the wavering loyalties of her own partner.

biography.bio: Natsuki Ozawa was born on April 19, 1972 in Oizumigakuen, Nerima, Tokyo, Japan as Junko Yamashita. She is an actress, known for Zero Woman (1995), Maruhi kaiten gyaku soap (1993) and Bee Bop highschool; Koko yotaro march (1987).
biography.name: Natsuki Ozawa

biography.bio: Saori Iwama is an actress, known for Zero Woman (1995), Tokusou Robo Janperson (1993) and The Audition (1984).
biography.name: Saori Iwama

biography.bio: Born in California, he is half Japanese and half Chinese. He began his training in martial arts at the age of one and a half. Since moving to Japan at the age of 18, he has done numerous movies and TV shows becoming one of the nation's most popular and recognizable talents. He has worked with some of the action movie greats including Jackie Chan, Jet Li and Jean-Claude Van Damme.
biography.name: Kane Kosugi

biography.bio: Hiroyuki Watari is an actor, known for Zero Woman (1995), Ghost Soup (1992) and Ureshi hazukashi monogatari (1988).
biography.name: Hiroyuki Watari

biography.bio: Tomomi Miyauchi is an actress, known for Zero Woman (1995), My Grandpa (2003) and Mischievous Kiss (2008).
biography.name: Tomomi Miyauchi

biography.bio: Hiromitsu Kiho is an actor, known for Zero Woman (1995).
biography.name: Hiromitsu Kiho

biography.bio: Minoru Toyoshima is an actor, known for The Thin Red Line (1998), Zero Woman (1995) and Moon Over Tao: Makaraga (1997).
biography.name: Minoru Toyoshima

biography.bio: Yoshitaka Yanagita is an actor, known for Zero Woman (1995), Kids Return (1996) and Ji dao zhui zong (1991).
biography.name: Yoshitaka Yanagita

biography.bio: Mitsuhiro Matsumoto is an actor, known for Zero Woman (1995).
biography.name: Mitsuhiro Matsumoto

biography.bio: Seitaro Fujii is an actor, known for Zero Woman (1995).
biography.name: Seitaro Fujii

biography.bio: Shigeki Katô is an actor, known for Zero Woman (1995), Histoire de fantômes à Yotsuya (1994) and Dead a Go! Go! (1999).
biography.name: Shigeki Katô

biography.bio: Yukio Yamato is an actor, known for Angel Dust (1994), Asian Beat: I Love Nippon (1991) and Jipangu (1990).
biography.name: Yukio Yamato

biography.bio: Jiro Dan was born on January 30, 1949 in Kyoto, Japan as Hideo Murata. He is an actor, known for Return of Ultraman (1971), Zero Woman (1995) and Superior Ultraman 8 Brothers (2008).
biography.name: Jiro Dan

biography.bio: Takanori Higuchi was born on November 10, 1958 in Toyonaka, Japan. He is an actor, known for Detective Byomkesh Bakshy! (2015), Crimes de guerre (2012) and Winds of God (1995).
biography.name: Takanori Higuchi

biography.bio: Tokuma Nishioka was born on October 5, 1946 in Kanagawa, Japan. He is an actor, known for Godzilla vs. King Ghidorah (1991), Zero Woman: Assassin Lovers (1996) and Femmes en miroir (2002).
biography.name: Tokuma Nishioka
